Data: Mills to Ponting, no run Ponting takes a couple of steps down the track as he jabs the ball toward cover
Mills to Ponting, no run short ball, Ponting guides the ball towards backward point

Mills to Ponting, 1 run, OUT Ponting's run out! he turns a full ball towards square leg , Neil Broom is the fielder, he's on to the ball in a flash, the throw is fantastic as well, powerful and accurate, McCullum whips the bails off and Ponting is a couple of feet short of the c
Mills to Hussey, 1 run David Hussey gets off the mark by turning his first ball to fine leg
Mills to Clarke, 1 wide digs in the bouncer, Clarke is well out of its way, that was so high it was called a wide
Mills to Clarke, no run slower delivery outside off, Clarke tries to dab it towards the offside, he's beaten
Mills to Clarke, no run angling into the batsman, Clarke gets on the front foot and defends
O'Brien to Hussey, no run starts off with a good delivery, on offstump, Hussey defends it back to the bowler
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run similar line, slightly outside off, Hussey tips it towards point and the batsmen pinch a single
O'Brien to Clarke, no run opens the face of the bat and guides it towards gully
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run a touch shorter this time, Clarke plays it with soft hands towards point
O'Brien to Hussey, no run keeps the ball in the corridor outside off, Hussey shoulders arms to this one
O'Brien to Hussey, no run much wider outside off this time, Hussey watches it sail through to the keeper
Vettori to Clarke, no run starts with an on-target ball, on a length on off, Clarke defends off the front foot
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run pitching on middle, Clarke works it to square leg for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run Hussey takes his cue from Clarke, repeats the shot Clarke played and that's another single
Vettori to Clarke, no run Clarke waltzes down the track and defends it to the leg side
Vettori to Clarke, no run much quicker delivery, Clarke guides it to backward point
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run gets on the front foot and drives to long-on for a single
O'Brien to Clarke, no run defended towards mid-off by Clarke
O'Brien to Clarke, no run back of a length, on offstump, Clarke mistimes his on-drive to the fielder at mid-on
O'Brien to Clarke, no run on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket by Clarke
O'Brien to Clarke, no run shortish ball, a lot of space for Clarke to work with outside off, he flashes at it but doesn't connect
O'Brien to Clarke, 2 runs much closer to the stumps, Clarke wanted to drive it through extra cover, gets a thick outside edge, runs away to third man
O'Brien to Clarke, no run finishes the over with a length ball on off, Clarke gets on the front foot and defends it back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run slightly overpitched, straying on the pads, Hussey tucks it to short midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside off this time, gets a thick edge onto his pads
Vettori to Hussey, no run driven towards the fielder at point
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run backs away to give himself room and cuts it behind point for a single
Vettori to Clarke, no run Clarke walks across his stumps and drops the ball to the leg side
O'Brien to Hussey, no run on middle and leg, Hussey can't capitalise on that one as his flick goes straight towards the fielder at midwicket
O'Brien to Hussey, FOUR runs slightly outside off, Hussey drives it through the covers for a boundary, Australia need more of those
O'Brien to Hussey, no run pitched up by O'Brien, driven forcefully to the fielder at cover
O'Brien to Hussey, no run wide outside off, Hussey shoulders arms to that one
O'Brien to Hussey, no run back of a length, on middle stump, Hussey defends it back towards the bowler
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run a hint of movement away after pitching well outside off, Hussey goes for the drive, a big outside edge sends the ball flying towards third man
Vettori to Hussey, no run shuffles across and plays an offstump ball to mid-on
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run wristily worked away towards square leg for a single
Vettori to Clarke, no run nicely tossed up, pitching just outside off, Clarke defends watchfully off the front foot
Vettori to Clarke, no run Clarke comes charging out of his crease, Vettori fires it in short, Clarke is forced to defend
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run just outside off, Clarke backs away to make room and cuts it towards backward point
Vettori to Hussey, no run another flighted delivery, Hussey was looking to work it to the legside, but can only defend it back to the bowler
O'Brien to Clarke, no run starts with a well-directed bouncer, outside off stump, Clarke shapes for the pull but doesn't go for the stroke
O'Brien to Clarke, FOUR runs Shot!, length is not as short this time, and it's on offstump, Clarke pulls that authoritatively off the front foot
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run fuller ball, on middle and leg, turned to fine leg
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run easy single for Hussey as he helps a wide ball to third man

O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run, OUT Another run-out! Clarke's gone, he square drives it past the diving backward point, Guptill does the fielding at the boundary, the throw is wonderful again, one-bounce and on top of the stumps, Clarke's inches short of making it as McCullum takes of
O'Brien to Hussey, no run Michael Hussey jabs his first ball towards point
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run played with soft hands by David towards gully
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run whipped away to midwicket for Michael Hussey's first run
Vettori to Hussey, no run flat delivery, David inside-edge it to short fine leg
Vettori to Hussey, no run runs it down to third man for a single
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run driven to mid-off for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run outside off, Michael Hussey lifts his bat and lets the ball go

Patel to Hussey, OUT strikes first ball, David Hussey's caught behind down the legside, short and angling down, goes for a paddle-pull, McCullum moves over to the leg side to take the catch, David Hussey's furious with the decision
Patel to Haddin, no run tossed up, on offstump, Haddin gets forward and defends
Patel to Haddin, no run length ball, Haddin blocks it off the backfoot
Patel to Haddin, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, Haddin gets his first run by tucking it to the leg side
Patel to Hussey, no run length ball outside off, Hussey gets on the backfoot and defends watchfully
Patel to Hussey, no run another display of Hussey's backfoot defensive ends the over
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on the stumps and he lunges forward in defence
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up, gets a long way forward and defends
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up and defended
Vettori to Haddin, no run flatter and drifting onto leg stump, Haddin defends it back

Vettori to Haddin, 1 run flat and sliding into Haddin, who lunges and stabs the ball to midwicket, sets off, Hussey is quick to call him on, McCullum shouts at Taylor to hustle with the throw but he's a fraction too late
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up on the stumps and he plays it watchfully
Patel to Haddin, no run slides down leg stump and Haddin turns it to midwicket
Patel to Haddin, no run flatter ball, shorter too, and Haddin plays it off the back foot
Patel to Haddin, 1 run tosses it up just outside off and he comes forward to push it away
Patel to Hussey, 1 run lovely loop on that one, dipping on Hussey, who pushes it to leg
Patel to Haddin, no run flat on off stump and he pushes it off the back foot
Patel to Haddin, no run flat on middle and off and punched back to Patel
Vettori to Hussey, 3 runs flights it wide and Hussey eases into a good-looking drive square through the off side, its into the gap and he runs hard, Elliott gives chase and pulls off a great dive
Vettori to Haddin, no run short and spinning away and Haddin dabs it to backward point
Vettori to Haddin, no run tosses it up to bring Haddin onto the front foot, patting it back to Vettori
Vettori to Haddin, no run lands it on the dime again, offering no quarter, and so Haddin blocks
Vettori to Haddin, no run very nagging line this, plenty of flight, landing on the seam, and defended
Vettori to Haddin, no run ends the over with another delivery on off stump which is defended
Patel to Hussey, 1 run short and wide and cut out to the deep cover sweeper for one
Patel to Haddin, SIX runs oh shot, Haddin! Lovely use of the feet, just a shimmy down the track and then an effortless chip straight back down the ground and its into the crowd, where a fan drops it
Patel to Haddin, no run fired in flat this time and he turns it to the on side fielder
Patel to Haddin, 1 run again flat on the stumps, turned away, sets off and the throw is late
Patel to Hussey, 1 run gently lobs it up outside off stump, it drifts in and Hussey drives to cover
Patel to Haddin, no run spins back in off a short length and he runs it right to backward point
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up on a length, committing Hussey firmly onto the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run drifts in and he clips it across the stumps into the gap at midwicket
Vettori to Haddin, no run eases forward, opens the face, and steers the ball to backward point
Vettori to Haddin, no run spins in, Haddin onto the front foot, then goes back and runs it fine
Vettori to Haddin, 2 runs tossed up, veers a bit straight and Haddin deflects it wide of square leg
Vettori to Haddin, no run fuller and flatter on middle and off and he stretches well forward
Patel to Hussey, 1 run tosses it up wide, it drifts in and Hussey cuts it square on the off side
Patel to Haddin, no run starts advancing, Patel sees him and fires it in, and Haddin defends
Patel to Haddin, 1 run spins in off a length, Haddin makes room and then guides it away
Patel to Hussey, 1 run gives it some air outside off and Hussey square-drives it to point
Patel to Haddin, no run tosses it up down the stumps, Haddin works it off the pads to square leg
Patel to Haddin, no run fuller delivery outside off, he comes well forward and pushes to cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run tosses up on off stump, Hussey uses his feet and on-drives a single
Vettori to Haddin, no run shorter length, not much turn and Haddin pushes it off the back foot
Vettori to Haddin, no run slower ball, well flighted on the seam and Haddin can only defend
Vettori to Haddin, no run a tad too wide, Haddin opens the face but can't beat backward point
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run flatter on middle and leg and Haddin works it to midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run comes well onto the front foot and dabs the ball in front of point, hustling
Patel to Hussey, 1 run stars to drift into leg stump and Hussey works it into the gap
Patel to Haddin, 1 run comes a long way forward and takes on the full, driving to mid-on
Patel to Hussey, 1 run flights it up gently outside off, Hussey gets forward with a square drive
Patel to Haddin, no run starts walking down, Patel keeps it short, Haddin taps it to midwicket
Patel to Haddin, 1 run uses his feet and whips the ball to midwicket again
Patel to Hussey, 1 run holds back the length a tad and Hussey pushes the ball to cover
Southee to Hussey, 3 runs starts off a touch short on the stumps and Hussey short-arm jabs it between midwicket and square leg, into the gap, the fielder runs after it and cuts it off in the deep
Southee to Haddin, no run short again, Haddin goes for his shot but cannot connect
Southee to Haddin, no run 130.5ks, short on the stumps and he gets tall to defend
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs makes some room and chips the fuller ball in the air over cover, its not timed all the well but he cleared the in field and picked up a couple more
Southee to Haddin, 1 run short of a length just outside off and he dabs it off the open face to gully
Southee to Hussey, no run short of a length, pitches on leg and slants across, its poked to point
Patel to Haddin, no run short ball, Haddin backs away and cuts from on top of off stump
Patel to Haddin, FOUR runs this time he beats the fielder, again rocking back to give the ball a hard cut, it bisects a tumbling Broom at backward point and Haddin gets a pleasing boundary
Patel to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on the stumps and he watchfully turns it to midwicket
Patel to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off, Hussey drives inside-out to the off side
Patel to Haddin, 1 run comes a few paces down and clips the ball past midwicket to Elliott
Patel to Hussey, no run flighted on off stump, he comes across and clips right to midwicket
Southee to Haddin, 1 run dragged in short down the stumps and he pulls with control into the opening at square leg and collects a single with the sweeper walking in to do the fielding

Southee to Hussey, 1 run pitches much fuller and Hussey gets right over it, just tapping it to the off side and calling Haddin across, Taylor swoops in, collects, and has a shy but it doesn't work out
Southee to Haddin, no run pitches on a length and stays low, looks like the slower off cutter, Haddin does well to pick it and gets the bat down in time, though he knew it could have been otherwise
Southee to Haddin, 2 runs makes room for himself and forces the shorter ball between cover and point, its not timed to perfection but Haddin's innovativeness gets him a couple more
Southee to Haddin, 1 run backs away to leg again and slaps the ball to backward point
Southee to Hussey, 1 run slower ball, just 117ks, pitches just outside leg stump and swings in, Hussey shuffles across and easily glances that off his pads in front of short fine leg
O'Brien to Hussey, no run pitches it full on off stump and Hussey pushes the ball to point
O'Brien to Hussey, no run pitches on about leg stump and this time he turns it to square leg
O'Brien to Hussey, no run short of a length and he gets right in line, defending off the back foot
O'Brien to Hussey, no run overpitched outside off stump, Hussey miscues a drive to short cover
O'Brien to Hussey, no run pitches wider, Hussey gets forward but cannot beat the man at point
O'Brien to Hussey, no run pitched up again and a firm drive down the ground can't beat mid-off
Mills to Haddin, no run pitches back of a length and Haddin steers it to backward point
Mills to Haddin, 1 run good shot, Haddin pushes a full ball on off stump with a full face and bunts it straight back past the stumps, calling for the sharp single that raises the 50-run stand
Mills to Hussey, no run full on off stump, Hussey stabs at it and mistimes it back to Mills
Mills to Hussey, no run overpitched a tad wider and he cracks a drive straight to short cover
Mills to Hussey, 1 run a tad wider still and he dabs it wide of backward point for one
Mills to Haddin, no run 130.7ks, short on off stump, Haddin hops and defends to leg
O'Brien to Hussey, no run full on the stumps, 119ks and swinging, Hussey pushes it back to O'Brien, who collects and feigns a throw back to the batsman
O'Brien to Hussey, no run short and wide but he cannot cut it past a tumbling Taylor at short cover
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run oh well bowled, that one is pitched up with some swing, Hussey pokes at it and gets an inside edge very narrowly sneaking back past leg stump
O'Brien to Haddin, 1 run full on the stumps and whipped past midwicket for a single
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs pitches it up on middle and off and Hussey chips it back in the air back past O'Brien and it beats mid-on as well
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run pitched up again and he pushes it down the ground for one
Mills to Hussey, no run sees the width and cracks it square but straight to the man at point
Mills to Hussey, no run change of pace, 111.7ks, on leg stump and he can't clip it well
Mills to Hussey, FOUR runs superb timing on this occasion, picking another slower delivery and comes well forward, making room and punching on the rise into the gap in the covers
Mills to Hussey, no run pitches on middle and he defends to the on side
Mills to Hussey, 1 run short of a length, he steers it off the back foot to backward point
Mills to Haddin, OUT dragged on! Haddin advances to a full one just outside off stump and goes for a drive but can only succeed in inside-edging back onto his stumps and Mills celebrates
Patel to Hussey, 1 run on a length, coming back into the batsman, Hussey works it off the backfoot towards cover
Patel to Hopes, no run nicely tossed up, on a length, the batsman defends it off the front foot
Patel to Hopes, no run drives confidently towards cover, but straight to the fielder
Patel to Hopes, 2 runs overpitched on legstump, tickled down the legs side by Hopes
Patel to Hopes, no run flicked towards short midwicket, no run
Patel to Hopes, no run carefully defends a tossed up delivery off the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs Vettori tosses one wide outside off, Hussey reaches out and gets that away behind point, Broom does the fieldeing
Vettori to Hussey, no run overpitched, Hussey lunges forward and opens the face to guide the ball towards gully
Vettori to Hussey, no run came forward and pushed it to cover
Vettori to Hussey, no run overpitched on offstump, Hussey deadbats it back to the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run on middle and leg, Hussey backs away and thumps it towards cover
Vettori to Hussey, no run length ball, pitching just outside off, Hussey waits for it on the backfoot and taps it to the off side
Patel to Hopes, FOUR runs flighted delivery, just outside off, Hopes was looking to drive, gets a thick outside edge past the keeper
Patel to Hopes, 1 run this turn it turns past leg, Hopes tucks it behind square, he was thinking of taking the second but he dropped his bat as he turned
Patel to Hussey, no run Hussey shows the full face of the bat and defends it solidly
Patel to Hussey, 1 run on the pads, Hussey works it towards midwicket for a single
Patel to Hopes, no run again Hopes is undone by the spin, he was aiming for the drive, gets a leading edge towards mid-on
Patel to Hopes, no run tossed up, blocked back towards the bowler
Vettori to Hussey, no run nice length there, Hussey is drawn onto the front foot as he jabs it towards mid-on
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run whistling down leg this time, Hussey whips it towards fine leg
Vettori to Hopes, no run gives that ball some air, Hopes backs away to make room for the cut, which goes straight to point
Vettori to Hopes, no run solid front-foot defence from Hopes
Vettori to Hopes, no run Vettori sticks to a nagging line outside off, Hopes defends off the front foot
Vettori to Hopes, no run on middle and leg, nudged towards short midwicket
Patel to Hussey, SIX runs another flighted delivery, Hussey rocks back and slogs that to his favourite midwicket area for a six
Patel to Hussey, 1 wide sliding down the legside, well taken by the keeper
Patel to Hussey, 1 run on the pads again, easily worked to square leg for a single
Patel to Hopes, no run swept by Hopes, by it is mistimed, goes straight to the fielder
Patel to Hopes, 1 run looks to play him straight this time, easy single to long-on
Patel to Hussey, 1 run width provided, Hussey cuts it square for a single
Patel to Hopes, 1 run on a length, outside off, Hopes chops that to backward point for another single
Southee to Hopes, 1 run cramps Hopes with an offstump line, Hopes was looking to cut, it rolls away towards the bowler, batsmen pinch a quick single
Southee to Hussey, no run full ball on middle, Hussey opens the face to guide it to backward point, placement isn't perfect, no run
Southee to Hussey, 1 run steps out to drive it down to long-off, batsmen saunter through for a single
Southee to Hopes, no run back of a length, good, tight line, Hopes jabs it towards extra cover

Southee to Hopes, no run slower ball, short and wide, Hopes chops it to point, straight to Guptill, Hussey was backing up a long way, a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have caught him way short, the throw misses though
Southee to Hopes, 1 run flicked to short mid wicket for a quick single
O'Brien to Hopes, 2 runs straying on to the pads, turned past mid-on , deep midwicket has to come across to cut if off
O'Brien to Hopes, 1 run on middle and leg, this time hopes punches it to Grant Elliott at mid-on, who fires in a throw at the stumps and catches Hopes just as he is finishing the run
O'Brien to Hussey, no run defended back to the bowler by Hussey
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs overpitched, Hussey finds the gap through the covers, Peter Fulton gives chase and keeps the batsmen to two
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run full ball on off, easy single down to long-off
O'Brien to Hopes, 1 run yorker on middle stump, Hopes pushes it to Elliott and sets off for a single, could have been tight if there was a direct hit
Southee to Hopes, no run short of a length on off, blocked back to the bowler by Hopes
Southee to Hopes, 1 run angling into offstump, Hopes whips it away to midwicket
Southee to Hussey, 1 run slower ball, 112kph, on middle stump, Hussey eases it down to long-off
Southee to Hopes, no run follows that up with a good bouncer, Hopes is surprised by that, but dodges it
Southee to Hopes, 2 runs on legstump, Hopes turns it to square leg, nice placement from Hopes gives batsmen time to take two
Southee to Hopes, no run back of a length, in the corridor outside off, Hopes wafts at it but is beaten

O'Brien to Hussey, OUT first ball of the Powerplay gets a wicket, Hussey has to go, he tried to chip a length ball over the infield, mid-off was on the edge of the circle, and it's a simple catch for him, Hussey's innings ends at 49
O'Brien to Johnson, 1 run shortish ball on legstump, Johnson prods it towards midwicket
O'Brien to Hopes, no run length ball on off, driven powerfully by Hopes, hits O'Brien on his knees and there's no run available

O'Brien to Hopes, OUT Hopes is gone, both the settled batsmen are dismissed in the same over, he was trying to slam that over the covers, gets a top edge which balloons in the air for a dolly to Vettori to mid-off
O'Brien to Bracken, no run slower ball first up for Bracken, shortish ball, hits him on the pads in front of middle, New Zealand are convinced he's lbw but that was going a bit high
O'Brien to Bracken, no run short ball, drops his wrists and lets it go
Southee to Johnson, 1 run punched to cover point by Johnson for a single
Southee to Bracken, no run angling in towards the offstump, Bracken shoulders arms to that one
Southee to Bracken, OUT Bracken's lbw this time, he was attempting to work that towards midwicket, hit him in front of middle, looked out, though Hawkeye suggests it might have just gone down leg
Southee to Tait, no run shortish ball on offstump, Tait pushes it towards cover
Southee to Tait, no run length ball on middle, Tait was backing away as he defended it towards the bowler
Southee to Tait, no run full straight ball on middle stump, Tait gets behind the line and defends
O'Brien to Johnson, no run overpitched and angling away from the batsman, Johnson taps it towards mid-off
O'Brien to Johnson, no run much shorter this time, at the batsman's body, Johnson tries to chop it behind point, can't beat the fielder
O'Brien to Johnson, FOUR runs Shot! flatbats a slower ball straight down the ground after clearing the front , O'Brien had no chnace of getting a hand on that
O'Brien to Johnson, no run looks to drive this time, but he's beaten by the ball that's angling away from him
O'Brien to Johnson, 1 run powerfully slammed down the ground, New Zealand have pushed mid-on to the boundary so that's only a single
O'Brien to Tait, no run full, slower ball, 119kmh, Tait does well to keep that one out, he digs it out towards cover
Mills to Johnson, 1 run short ball outside off, Johnson backed away to give himself more room and powers that to the offside but the fielder at point makes a diving stop
Mills to Tait, no run length ball, on middle and off, Tait goes back and blocks it back to the bowler

Mills to Tait, FOUR runs slightly overpitched, just outside off, Tait goes after that one, takes the aerial route, over mid-off, timing isn't too good, but there's enough in the shot to take the ball to the boundary
Mills to Tait, no run shorter ball this time, on off, Tait was backing away, he beaten as he tries to nudge it towards third man
Mills to Tait, 1 run Tait takes a couple of paces behind legstump again, Mills follows him, Tait manages to taps that to the offside for a single
Mills to Johnson, 1 run full ball on the pads, Johnson flicks it for a single towards midwicket to retain the strike
O'Brien to Johnson, no run yorker outside off, Johnson can only squeeze it to backward point
O'Brien to Johnson, FOUR runs length ball on middle stump, Johnson smashes that down the ground, beats a diving long-on for a boundary
O'Brien to Johnson, no run tipped towards mid-off, Johnson declines the single
O'Brien to Johnson, 1 run low full toss, Johnson swipes it down the ground again, this time long-off gets across in time to keep the batsmen down to a single
O'Brien to Tait, no run Tait goes for an extremely ambitious shot, shortish ball on middle stump, Tait backs away and tries to chip it over the wicketkeeper, beaten
O'Brien to Tait, FOUR runs this time the ball does fly over the keeper, O'Brien digs in the bouncer, Tait goes for the hook, gets a top edge and that's a boundary
Mills to Johnson, no run Johnson throws his bat at a wide ball, bottom hand comes off after that shot, goes towards deep point but Johnson again doesn't want the single
Mills to Johnson, FOUR runs Cracking shot! low full toss on the offstump, a lovely swing of the bat from Johnson sends the ball rocketing back in the direction it came
Mills to Johnson, 2 runs Johnson shows us he's not all about power, the bowler follows him as Johnson backs away, the batsman just opens the face of the bat to guide it through the first slip region
Mills to Johnson, OUT and that's the end of the innings, Johnson goes for a big swipe over midwicket, doesn't make contact with the ball, which homes in on the leg bail, Australia fold for 181

We'll be back in just about 40 minutes. You could spend the break checking out Cricinfo's

Ponting won the toss and elected to bat first, but that decision quickly backfired as the top order crumbled and Australia limped to 5 for 55 from 20 overs. A 61-run rescue partnership between Michael Hussey and Haddin boosted Australia, but a late flurry of wickets allowed New Zealand
Mills finishes with 4 for 35 and Australia have failed to bat out their alloted overs. Their struggles continue from the South Africa series, and New Zealand need 181 to take a lead in the series.
Welcome back for the New Zealand chase, 182 to get, Shaun Tait has the ball, McCullum to face
Tait to McCullum, no run cracker of a delivery to start with, length ball on off, squares McCullum up, he tries to play it to leg, gets a leading edge which drops just short of backward point
Tait to Fulton, no run jags away from the batsman after pitching on a length outside off, Fulton leaves it well alone
Tait to Fulton, no run cranking up the pace here, that was 149.8, full and swung away, Fulton is beaten all ends up, it slides under his bat through to the keeper
Tait to Fulton, no run shorter ball this time, tight line around off, Fulton defends off the backfoot
Tait to Fulton, 1 wide late swing for Tait but that was too wide outside off for the umpire's liking

Tait to Fulton, no run finishes the over with another testing delivery, back of a length, pitching just outside off, it had Fulton feeling for it before he withdrew his bat to let it sail through to the keeper
Bracken to Guptill, no run Bracken starts with a delivery on the pads, Guptill tucks it towards the leg side
Bracken to Guptill, no run shortish ball from Bracken, Guptill gets across and defends it, an inside edge onto his pads
Bracken to Guptill, no run length ball on off, Guptill drives uppishly towards mid-off, lands short of David Hussey who makes a full-length dive to his right to stop the ball
Bracken to Guptill, no run similar line and length, this time Guptill defends solidly back to the bowler, showing the full face of the bat
Bracken to Guptill, no run just outside off, Guptill bravely lets that one go through to the keeper
Bracken to Guptill, no run slightly wider than the previous one, Guptill shoulders arms again
Tait to Fulton, 1 wide starts off with a full ball down the leg side, he'll have to bowl that one again
Tait to Fulton, 1 wide goes to the other extreme of the previous ball, 151.5 kmh bouncer way outside off now
Tait to Fulton, no run outswinger, Fulton looks to cut it but is beaten
Tait to Fulton, no run overpitched on middle and off, Fulton gets behind the line and defends
Tait to Fulton, no run length ball, nice, tight line on offstump, Fulton defends it back to the bowler
Tait to Fulton, no run fishes at a full swinging ball outside off, he's beaten this time, but that's a dangerous ploy
Tait to Fulton, no run back of a length on off, moves a touch away from the right-hand batsman, Fulton defends confidently toward cover
Tait to Fulton, no run wide ball outside off, Fulton leaves that one to the keeper, nearly called a wide but Tait gets away with that one
Bracken to Guptill, FOUR runs overpitched on legstump, easy pickings for Guptill, he flicks that to the midwicket boundary to get the first runs off the bat for New Zealand
Bracken to Guptill, no run outside the off stump, Guptill gets on the front foot, and shoulders arms
Bracken to Guptill, 2 runs drives a length ball towards extra cover, wasn't too far from Ponting at short cover, who gets a hand to it
Bracken to Guptill, no run angling across Guptill, who defends it to the legside
Bracken to Guptill, no run in the channel just outside off, Guptill isn't interested in that one, leaves that for the keeper
Bracken to Guptill, no run overpitched on off, driven forcefully towards mid-off, but too forcefully to give the batsmen time to take a single
Tait to Fulton, no run short ball, well outside off, Fulton isn't tempted into chasing that one, it sails through to the keeper, that one was 148kmh
Tait to Fulton, no run angling into the batsman, length ball, birthday boy Fulton defends it towards mid-on
Tait to Fulton, no run Fulton's beaten again, pitched up by Tait, around the offstump, Fulton goes for the booming drive, the away swing gets the better of him
Tait to Fulton, no run low full toss on offstump, Fulton punches it back to the bowler
Tait to Fulton, no run short of a length, and angling into Fulton, thuds into his pads as he tries to defend off the backfoot

Tait to Fulton, FOUR runs Fulton gets off the mark with a superbly-timed off dirve, it was again a back of a length delivery, Fulton just pushed it in the gap, Marsh was giving chase, he never looked like catching up and he falls over ten yards away from the boundary
Johnson to Guptill, no run starts off with a well-directed bouncer, goes straight at Guptill's chest, who manages to awkwardly defend it
Johnson to Guptill, SIX runs sensational shot! length ball on legstump, Guptill flicks it off his pads for an effortless six

Johnson to Guptill, no run hits Guptill on the pad, he's not a long way forward, there's a big appeal from the Australians but that looked like it was pitching outside leg, Hawkeye suggests it was pitching on middle and leg though
Johnson to Guptill, no run this time he defends it towards mid-off off the backfoot
Johnson to Guptill, no run short ball on legstump, Guptill gets behind the line and defends it solidly back to the bowler
Johnson to Guptill, no run more backfoot defence from Guptill, this time he drops the ball at his feet
Bracken to Fulton, no run drives it to Ponting at short cover
Bracken to Fulton, 1 wide wide, way too wide outside off
Bracken to Fulton, no run back on target this time, length ball pitching on middle, slightly slower ball, Fulton lunges forward and defends
Bracken to Fulton, no run slightly outside off, Fulton steps across and drives through the line, can't beat the fielder at extra cover though
Bracken to Fulton, no run slower ball again, 122.7k, pitching just outside leg, Fulton defends it off the backfoot
Bracken to Fulton, 2 runs Fulton fortunate to survive, he was aiming to work that delivery from middle stump to the legside, takes a leading edge and flies over the covers

Bracken to Fulton, no run ooh, Fulton didn't have much clue about that one either, he was trying to defend it back to the bowler, gets an inside edge, and the ball could so easily have rolled back onto his stumps
Johnson to Guptill, no run length ball on legstump to start, Guptill gets on his toes and blocks it towards square leg
Johnson to Guptill, no run on middle and off this time, defended solidly by Guptill
Johnson to Guptill, no run good length ball from Johnson, about a foot outside off, Guptill lifts his bat and lets it go
Johnson to Guptill, no run Johnson reverts to attacking the legstump, Guptill was looking to work that behind square, gets an edge and the ball drops at his feet
Johnson to Guptill, no run Johnson keeps Guptill pinned to the backfoot, this time the batsman defends towards the offside
Johnson to Guptill, no run pushes the length up a touch this time, on offstump, Guptill defends again, this time towards extra cover
Bracken to Fulton, no run Bracken's on target again, length ball, defended off the backfoot to short cover
Bracken to Fulton, no run this time Fulton chases a short ball outside off, goes for a powerful cut, doesn't make contact though
Bracken to Fulton, 1 run strays on to the pads, Fulton hepls himself to an easy single by flicking that to square leg
Bracken to Guptill, no run length delivery, defended off the front foot by Guptill towards cover
Bracken to Guptill, no run the length is a lot shorter this time, pushing Guptill back, and he blocks it to the offside
Bracken to Guptill, no run a bit of width for Guptill to work with, he's thrashes that behind square but can't beat a diving Michael Clarke
Johnson to Fulton, 1 leg bye On Fulton's legstump, called a legbye after Haddin fails to collect the ball, but that was actually a wide down the leg side
Johnson to Guptill, no run
Johnson to Guptill, no run slower ball, on a length, angling across the batsman who's beaten as he goes for the big drive
Johnson to Guptill, no run another delivery that's angling across the batsman, a bit wider than the previous one, Guptill shoulders arms
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run Johnson goes back to the leg-stump line, flicked by Guptill to midwicket for two
Johnson to Fulton, no run driven crisply by Fulton to mid-off, no run
Bracken to Guptill, no run pitches on a length and he defends it off the front foot to point

Bracken to Guptill, OUT bowled em! Bracken strikes with a full delivery that pitches on off stump and hurries Guptill into a loose defensive push, but he's very late on the shot and the ball nips back in and draws the faintest of inside edges back onto the stumps

Bracken to Taylor, no run oh big shout first ball! Bracken again serves it up full, marginally pitching outside leg stump, the ball swings back in and raps an itchy Taylor as he falls forward, replays suggest the ball was doing a bit too much, but it was more about where it init
Bracken to Taylor, no run full again and he thrusts forward to defend
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitches on about off stump and Taylor stabs it to the off side
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitches on leg stump and slides on, Taylor shuffles and defends
Johnson to Fulton, no run short of a length outside off stump, Fulton pushes off the back foot
Johnson to Fulton, no run so close! Johnson pitches it up on the stumps, Fulton plays an attempted flick and its back in the air toward a diving bowler, bouncing tantalizingly short
Johnson to Fulton, no run too much movement and the ball swing wide of the stumps
Johnson to Fulton, no run serves it up outside off stump and Fulton drives on the up to cover
Johnson to Fulton, no run nagging length, not full enough to drive and so Fulton defends
Johnson to Fulton, no run much fuller this time, 142.5ks, Fulton has a go and misses
Bracken to Taylor, no run back of a length and seaming across Taylor, who shoulders arms
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitched up and he pushes it straight to cover
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitches outside off stump and wobbles away and no shot offered
Bracken to Taylor, no run no room to work with at all and Taylor defends to the off side
Bracken to Taylor, no run again its pitched up around off stump and he pushes it to cover
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitched up and seaming with the angle, Taylor shoulders arms
Johnson to Fulton, no run pitches back of a length and slides back in, stays low and Fulton just gets a bit of bat on it, a stifled appeal from Johnson, indicative of two sounds on that occasion

Johnson to Fulton, OUT well held, Mitchell! A very scratchy innings comes to an end courtesy a superb reflex catch from Johnson, who pitches it up on off stump and then sticks out his left hand as he tumbles down in his followthrough, plucking the checked off-drive back in the a
Johnson to Elliott, 2 runs pitches short of a length down leg stump and Elliott hops across to flick it into the gap, opening his account immediately
Johnson to Elliott, no run pitches on the stumps and stays low and he turns it to midwicket
Johnson to Elliott, no run beaten! Johnson pitches it up just outside off stump and gets the ball to shape away and then straighten, Elliott walks into the push and misses very narrowly
Johnson to Elliott, no run full down leg stump, Elliott walks across the sticks and misses, and the ball narrowly misses taking out leg stick
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs and he's welcomed with a smashing drive through the covers from Taylor, getting to the pitch of that wide one and hitting it cleanly into the gap
Hopes to Taylor, no run better length, holding it back to get Taylor defending to cover
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run pitches on off stump, Taylor walks into a defensive push to extra cover
Hopes to Elliott, no run pitched up wide and he shoulders arms off the front foot
Hopes to Elliott, no run full just outside off stump and he defends it to the off side
Hopes to Elliott, no run pitches on a length and some very conservative defensive stuff follows
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run slides down leg stump and he turns it into the gap at square leg
Johnson to Elliott, 1 wide bounces well down the leg stump and a wide is called
Johnson to Elliott, 1 wide thats really overpitched, sliding out the hand, well past off stump

Johnson to Elliott, 1 run tip-and-run from Elliott, defending to cover and sprinting off in search of the 22-yard Olympic Gold, his partner Taylor is struggling as Clarke swoops in and misses a one-handed throw toward the stumps, that was pretty close there
Johnson to Taylor, no run short of a length and sitting up, Taylor gets tall and shoulders arms
Johnson to Taylor, no run swings back down leg stump, Taylor is late on the attempted nudge
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs overpitched wide of the stumps and Taylor laces a square-drive into the gap behind point, third man runs across but cannot cut it off, that was scorching shot
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run pitches down leg stump and he tucks it down to deep square
Hopes to Taylor, no run 125ks, pitches wide of the stumps and no shot offered
Hopes to Taylor, no run again Hopes pitches a tad wide and Taylor shoulders arms
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs drifting down the pads and Taylor plays a perfect leg glance for four
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitches on a length, Taylor comes forward and nudges to point

Hopes to Taylor, 2 runs dropped by Johnson at third man! Taylor sees width and flashes the bat at it, getting a top edge that spirals down to the fielder running in, who slides onto his knees and clutches at it, but fails to pick it cleanly in the end, was tough but needed to be
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitched up and eases it to point off the front foot
Tait to Elliott, no run pitches just outside off stump and Elliott defends to point
Tait to Elliott, 1 run banged in short down leg stump, 142ks, Elliott walks across and aims to deflect it off the hips but cannot connect, the ball clips his gloves and dribbles to Haddin
Tait to Taylor, 1 leg bye overpitched down the stumps, 144ks, flicked to square leg
Tait to Elliott, 1 run short on the body and Elliott hops across to deflect it to fine leg, that single raises the 50 for New Zealand, a long time coming, I might add
Tait to Taylor, 3 runs pitched up outside off stump and he drives on the rise, square on the off side, just picking the gap and Taylor and Elliott sprint back and forth three times
Tait to Elliott, 1 run overpitched on the stumps, he shuffles and clips off the toes to square leg
Hopes to Elliott, no run comes forward and watchfully defends a length delivery
Hopes to Elliott, no run pitches on a good length, Elliott drives on the rise to Ponting at short cover
Hopes to Elliott, no run another tidy delivery on a length and more watchful defending
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run drives a fuller one to Ponting at short cover, who fumbles the ball
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitches on a length and straightens, Taylor defends it back to Hopes
Hopes to Taylor, no run short ball outside off, 130ks, and Taylor ducks low
Tait to Elliott, 4 leg byes slides down the pads, Elliott gets a faint tickle that beats Haddin
Tait to Elliott, no run short outside off stump this time and he hops in line to defend
Tait to Elliott, no run short on off stump now and he gets behind the ball to defend
Tait to Elliott, 1 leg bye bangs it in shorter, he goes for a pull across the line and misses, the ball clips his midriff and parries down towards short third man
Tait to Taylor, no run better length, with some swing, and its defended off the front foot
Tait to Taylor, no run pitches full and he defends off the front foot to cover
Hopes to Elliott, no run short of a length on leg stump and he tucks it to midwicket
Hopes to Elliott, no run full on about off stump and he taps it back to Hopes
Hopes to Elliott, no run pitches it up, Elliott drives off the front foot to Ponting at short cover
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run much wider and fuller and he opens the face, steering to third man
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitched up and he pushes it to the off side
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full again and he squirts it to the man at point for one
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run tosses it up full and Taylor flashes a drive into the covers
Clarke to Elliott, no run tossed up on a better length and he defends it back solidly
Clarke to Elliott, no run gets some room and hits the ball square but can't beat point
Clarke to Elliott, no run tossed up, this time Elliott walks two paces down and defends
Clarke to Elliott, no run flatter and shorter and he punches off the back foot to cover
Clarke to Elliott, no run flights it up and gets some drift, Elliott pushes it back to Clarke
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run makes room and edges it down to third man, that ball kicked like a mule
Hopes to Elliott, no run pitches it up and this time he defends it back
Hopes to Broom, no run pitches short of a length and he gets up to leave it be
Hopes to Broom, no run fuller, a tad, and he leaves it be as it wobbles to Haddin
Hopes to Broom, no run hits a good length and Broom gets bat on it, defending to the off side
Clarke to Taylor, no run tossed up on off stump and Taylor defends it back patiently
Clarke to Taylor, no run tossed up again and he pushes it off the front foot to cover
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run lobs it up and he collects on the full, bunting it down to long-on
Clarke to Broom, no run shorter and he goes back and pushes with an inside edge
Clarke to Broom, 2 runs short outside off stump, cut wide of the fielder, they come back for the second and flat direct hit comes back to Haddin's ends, replays confirm Broom is home safe
Clarke to Broom, no run tossed up and he defends it back solidly to end the over
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitches wide of off stump and he dabs the ball to the off side
Hopes to Taylor, no run hits a length and he forces the ball to Clarke at point
Hopes to Taylor, no run gets some room and cuts hard but Clarke intercepts at point
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitches on middle and off and he presents a full face back
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitches it up and Taylor plays a loose shot outside off the stump
Hopes to Taylor, no run overpitched and he miscues the drive to cover, ending a maiden over
Johnson to Broom, no run lands it on a good length outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching Haddin
Johnson to Broom, no run fires in the yorker outside off and Broom fails to dig it out
Johnson to Broom, no run tries to turn it away to the on side but he gets an inside edge onto his boot
Johnson to Broom, no run chance to drive through the covers on the front foot but he fails to beat Hussey in that position
Johnson to Broom, 1 run the slower ball, he reaches out and glides it down to third man
Johnson to Taylor, no run full on the offstump and driven straight to mid-off, New Zealand aren't able to break free here
Hopes to Broom, no run tries to work it to the onside but gets a leading edge to the off side
Hopes to Broom, 1 run full on middle and leg and he pushes it away firmly to mid-on
Hopes to Taylor, no run he gets a lot of width outside off to cut but he picks Clarke at backward point, a scoring opportunity missed
Hopes to Taylor, no run slightly full angling towards the pads, he gets his bat behind the line and pushes it to mid-off
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run fullish in length outside off, he gets forward and pats it wide of mid-off
Hopes to Broom, 1 run gets forward for the square drive and times it pretty well wide of backward point, Johnson sprints across from third man and cuts it off
Clarke to Broom, no run flighted on middle and leg and he drives firmly but can
Clarke to Broom, 1 run drifts outside off, he gets forward and steers it wide of point
Clarke to Taylor, no run angled on the pads, he clips it to square leg
Clarke to Taylor, no run full on middle and leg and softly tapped to the on side
Clarke to Taylor, no run flighted on middle and leg, he defends to the off side
Clarke to Taylor, no run lunges forward and defends back to the bowler
Hussey to Broom, no run very slow through the air, he gets forward and drives firmly
Hussey to Broom, 2 runs gets down the track and nicely whips him away wide of midwicket
Hussey to Broom, 2 byes opens the face of the bat and steers him down to the vacant slips region
Hussey to Broom, no run thrusts forward and defends
Hussey to Broom, no run commits to the front foot and a firm drive is intercepted by Clarke at short mid-off
Hussey to Broom, 1 run angled on the pads, he works it away down to fine leg
Clarke to Broom, 1 run full outside off and driven to the off side
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to mid-off
Clarke to Broom, no run slower through the air, he waits on it before cutting to short third man

Clarke to Broom, no run Run-out appeal! He nudges it to square leg and quickly sends his partner back, a direct hit by David Hussey has all the Australians celebrating, the third umpire takes a look and Taylor's safe
Clarke to Broom, 1 run
Clarke to Taylor, 2 wide slides down the leg side and it appears to hit Broom's bat before running down to fine leg but the umpire calls it a wide
Clarke to Broom, no run makes room and cuts to mid-off
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run gets forward and defends to the off side
Hussey to Broom, no run flighted on middle and pushed to the off side
Hussey to Broom, 1 run slower through the air, he gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square-leg
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run flighted outside off and he square drives to point
Hussey to Broom, 1 wide fires it down the leg side and the batsman misses the sweep, wide called, his back foot is back at the crease
Hussey to Broom, 2 runs flighted on the pads and he forcefully pushes it past the gap at deep midwicket, Hilfenhaus does the fielding
Hussey to Broom, 2 runs full outside off, he pushes it wide of point
Tait to Taylor, no run lands it on a good length on the off stump, he gets behind the line and pats it to the on side
Tait to Taylor, no run slides down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and very nearly beats Haddin who does well to dive and cut it off
Tait to Taylor, 1 run gives him width outside off and he slices it down to third man
Tait to Broom, FOUR runs Tait fires in a fast yorker and Broom gets his bat down and digs it out, the ball bounces and beats first slip and runs away for four
Tait to Broom, no run full outside off, he pushes it to the off side
Tait to Broom, 1 run fires in a full length ball and he digs it to the on side
Hussey to Broom, no run tries to work it past the bowler but Hussey does well to stop it
Hussey to Broom, 1 wide slides wide down the leg side
Hussey to Broom, 1 run flighted outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run tucked towards cover
Hussey to Broom, no run shuffles and clips it to midwicket
Hussey to Broom, 1 run pushes it through the line to long-on and the 100 comes up after a lot of struggle
Hussey to Taylor, no run flighted on middle and leg and pushed back to the bowler
Tait to Broom, no run Tait cramps him for room as the ball jags back in and slices him in half almost, the ball lobs off his pads to the keeper
Tait to Broom, no run gets forward to drive but the ball clips his pad first and then bat, there's a stifled appeal but he was well outside the line of off stump
Tait to Broom, FOUR runs Tait searches for the yorker and slides down the leg side, he clips it away fine and Bracken dives in vain at fine leg, great effort all the same
Tait to Broom, 1 run angles it on the pads again but this time he clips it wide of midwicket
Tait to Taylor, no run goes for a wide slash on the half-forward prod but misses it completely, the ball shoots back in and nearly shaves the edge
Tait to Taylor, no run holds the length back on the offstump and he gets behind the line and defends
Hopes to Broom, no run lands it on a good length and he tries to steer it away to the on side but checks his stroke and pats it back to the bowler
Hopes to Broom, no run bowls it straight again and he settles for another defensive stroke
Hopes to Broom, no run angled on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
Hopes to Broom, no run slightly short of a length outside off and he cuts but mistimes the shot to backward point
Hopes to Broom, no run fuller in length outside off and steered to point
Hopes to Broom, 1 run he finds the length to pull but he mistimes the shot and places it wide of midwicket
Clarke to Broom, no run clipped to midwicket

Clarke to Broom, OUT Australia claw back, now there's a bit of controversy here, Clarke gets it to skid through on a good length, Broom makes a lot of room to cut but he's beaten for pace, the ball appears to clip the top of the off bail but replays indicate that Haddin had his
Clarke to Mills, no run
Clarke to Mills, 1 run
Clarke to Taylor, no run
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run slides down the leg side and he nudges it to fine leg
Hussey to Taylor, FOUR runs steps down to a full toss and he clubs it away down to the spaces between long-on and deep midwicket
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run gets forward and pushes it to long-on
Hussey to Mills, no run full outside off and driven to mid-off
Hussey to Mills, no run gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Hussey to Mills, no run defends back to the bowler
Hussey to Mills, no run punches it firmly to Clarke at mid-off
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, no run the ball skids through sharply and he makes use of the extra pace to glide it wide of the keeper and short third man
Clarke to Taylor, FOUR runs stays back to a good length ball and defends
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run gets forward and steers a full ball to cover point
Clarke to Mills, no run gets forward and steers it wide of cover
Clarke to Mills, 1 run pushed to the deep on the on side
Hopes to Mills, 1 run slides on the pads and he clips it to the on side
Hopes to Taylor, no run tapped back to the bowler
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run stays back to a good length ball and clips it wide of square leg
Hopes to Mills, no run almost edged! He lands it outside off and gets it to slant away and Mills pokes at it
Hopes to Mills, no run bangs it in short, he attempts to hook it away but misses it
Hopes to Mills, 1 run pushes it to cover point and they contemplate a single, the fielder has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end
Johnson to Mills, no run fires it full and quick outside off and he fails to dig out the yorker
Johnson to Mills, 1 run full outside off and driven wide of backward point
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full outside off and he drives, the sweeper cover fielder runs across to cut it off
Johnson to Mills, no run this one skids through, he gets a thick inside edge and the ball bobs off the pitch and rolls to the keeper
Johnson to Mills, no run wide outside off and he has a wild swing at the ball, pretty close to being called a wide
Johnson to Mills, 1 run hangs his bat outside off and steers it to third man
Hopes to Mills, 1 run lands it outside off and Mills gets off the strike with a glide to third man
Hopes to Taylor, no run gets across the line and works it to long-on
Hopes to Taylor, no run the slower ball this time, he drives hard and the underedge falls short of the keeper
Hopes to Taylor, no run drives forcefully to the off side and he fails to beat the field, it's now down to a run a ball
Hopes to Taylor, no run goes for a forceful square drive but he gets a thick inside edge on to his body
Hopes to Taylor, no run short of a length outside off and he withdraws the stroke
Johnson to Mills, no run swing and a miss, he makes room to crash it through the off side but he's beaten for pace
Johnson to Mills, 1 run full just outside the line of the offstump, he gets forward and steers it firmly to third man
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run the slower ball, on the stumps. he gets behind the line and steers it wide of cover
Johnson to Mills, no run it's a low full toss outside off and he really reaches out to slam it away but the ball makes contact with the toe of the bat and he places it back to the bowler instead

Johnson to Mills, 1 run goes for a huge heave to the on side but he gets a thick outside edge, Hopes runs across and the ball nearly spins away from him and runs to the boundary, luckily he gets a hand to it
Johnson to Taylor, no run jams it the yorker outside off and Haddin appeals half-heartedly for the outside edge

Bracken to Mills, FOUR runs and Mills gets off to a good start, he gets width outside off from round the wicket, he stays at the wicket and glides it wide of the vacant slips region and short third man
Bracken to Mills, FOUR runs that's a cracker of a shot, Bracken overpitches outside off from round the wicket, he drives elegantly past the covers and the ball scorches through the turf
Bracken to Mills, 1 run angles it on the pads and he whips it away wide of square leg
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run attempts a yorker but it's a low full toss which he works away down to long-off
Bracken to Mills, 1 run full in length outside off, he gets behind the line and forces it to long-off
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run it's a low full toss on middle and leg and he pushes it away towards long-on
Tait to Taylor, no run jams it on a good length on the offstump, he gets behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler

Tait to Taylor, SIX runs Into the crowd! Can we have the ball back please? Taylor gets to his fifty in style, he backs away from the stumps, gets underneath a pitched up delivery on middle and leg and heaves it over deep midwicket and in to the grass embankment
Tait to Taylor, 1 run slides on the pads, he shuffles and works it behind square on the on side
Tait to Mills, no run almost a run-out! He taps it to cover and Taylor darts out of his crease and immediately turns around and heads back and the fielder decides not to throw
Tait to Mills, no run full outside off, goes for the drive and misses
Tait to Mills, FOUR runs take that! Tait overpitches outside of and Mills gets forward and caresses it wide of cover, perfectly timed, that's 11 off the over
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run fires in the yorker, the ball bounces high off the pitch after the batsman drives back and Bracken gets his fingers to intercept it
Bracken to Mills, no run makes room and Bracken cleverly holds the length and forces the batsman to check his shot, he fends it to the off side
Bracken to Mills, 1 run Mills backs away and Bracken once again follows him and directs it at his body, he settles for a single with a nudge to the on side
Bracken to Taylor, 2 runs the slower ball, it's short in length and he swats it in to the gap at deep midwicket
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run slices it firmly to the off side and Clarke is simply brilliant at point as he slides to his left and intercepts it one handed
Bracken to Mills, 1 run comes round the wicket, he gets behind the line and pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Mills, 1 run comes over the wicket, he fires that full outside off and he drives firmly to long-off
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs you can't bowl high full tosses at this stage, it's a freebie for Taylor outside off as he reaches out and slashes it off the middle of the bat and beats backward point
Johnson to Taylor, no run good comeback by Johnson as he fires the yorker outside off and Taylor fails to get underneath it
Johnson to Taylor, 1 wide inconsistent stuff from Johnson as he slides it wide down the leg side, the batsman calmly lets it go
Johnson to Taylor, no run drifts on the pads and Taylor has the opportunity to whip it away but he fails to beat Ponting at midwicket
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs clips it wide of square leg and Warner is simply fantastic as he sprints across, slides and saves a four, he limits it to two runs, the throw is too high though for Haddin
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full toss on middle and leg and he firmly pushes it through the line to long-on, there's protection there
Tait to Taylor, 1 leg bye bowls it short of a length and the ball clips his pads and rolls to short square leg off the hips
Tait to Mills, no run he exposes his stumps and tries to heave the ball to the on side but he fails to read the slower ball and the ball hits him flush on the abdomen, he's in pain
Tait to Vettori, no run comes round the wicket and cramps him for roo, he hops at the crease and fends off a short ball to point

Tait to Vettori, 1 run Vettori steers it wide of Clarke at backward point and sets off for a sharp single, the throw is just wide and all of a sudden, a male spectator in shorts runs onto the field carrying a beach ball! An army of security personnel chase him and try to trip hi
Tait to Taylor, 1 leg bye he takes his eyes off a bouncer and the ball clips his body and rolls to the off side
Bracken to Taylor, no run it
Bracken to Taylor, no run excellent bowling by Bracken, he bowls the slower one on a yorker length and Taylor can only push it back to the bowler

Bracken to Taylor, OUT a fabulous catch by Clarke and we have a twist in the tale here, Bracken pitches it up outside off, he walks across his stumps, reaches forward and slices it on the up to backward point, Clarke flings himself to his left and cups it with both hands

Bracken to Southee, no run this is getting more dramatic! Southee taps a yorker length ball towards short mid-off and sends his partner back, the fielder under arms the ball at the stumps and misses, the fielder backing up misfields and the batsmen contemplate an over throw, Vet
Bracken to Southee, 2 runs
Bracken to Southee, 1 bye beaten outside the off stump, they steal a bye
Tait to Southee, no run bangs it in short, he tries to hook but misses
Tait to Southee, 1 run he makes room and exposes all three stumps, he gets an inside edge past the stumps and Haddin does really well to save it, they steal a run
Tait to Vettori, no run comes round the wicket, Vettori backs away too far and he fails to make any contact
Tait to Vettori, no run he bangs in the bouncer from round the wicket and Vettoru ducks under it hoping it will be called a no ball, Bucknor at square leg signals one for the over
Tait to Vettori, 2 runs fires in the yorker outside off and he gets forward and digs it out wide of point
Tait to Vettori, 1 run backs away and Tait bangs it in short, he adjusts his stroke and slices it down to third man
Bracken to Vettori, 1 run fires that on the blockhole and he pushes it firmly through the line to long-on
Bracken to Patel, 1 run gets forward and steers it down to backward point and the batsmen are struggling, the fielder has a shy at the bowler'
Bracken to Vettori, 1 run fires in the yorker and he gets underneath a low full toss and works it away to deep square leg
Bracken to Patel, 1 run just opens the face of the bat and steers it to short third man, New Zealand can't lose now, the scores are level

Bracken to Vettori, 1 run he's done it! Vettori's hit the winning run! Bracken bowls a full ball outside off stump, he was looking for the yorker no doubt.Vettori loves width outside off, he loves the cut, and he places the ball through backward point and yells in triumph

Kyle Mills is the Player of the Match for taking four wickets and then scoring 26 runs just when the chase got really tense. The next game is on Friday at the MCG, do join us for that. Thank you for your emails, on behalf of today's commentary team (Jamie, Sid R, and Kanishkaa) this is
New Zealand won by 2 wickets
Player of the match is Kyle Mills, NZ
